title: Suspected Houthi attacks target a ship in Gulf of Aden and Israeli port city of Eilat
description: Suspected attacks by Yemen's Houthi rebels early Wednesday targeted a ship in the Gulf of Aden and the southern Israeli port city of Eilat, authorities said.

title: WikiLeaks' Assange pleads guilty in deal with U.S. that secures his freedom, ends legal fight
description: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange pleaded guilty to a single felony charge for publishing U.S. military secrets in a deal with Justice Department prosecutors that secures his freedom and concludes a drawn-out legal saga that raised divisive questions about press freedom and national security.
